Text: Man could you tell me why the audio isnt working? :S
I solved the audio mystery. The Matroska container is damaged. Solution: ffmpeg -i damaged.mkv -vcodec copy -acodec ac3 -ab 192k -scodec copy new.mkv
Audio isnt working for me either... for seasons 6 to 9... the rest are fine. How can I fix this?
I have also had problems with the sound, it works with mplayer but that is glitchy with video and vlc works perfectly with video but no audio....
